mapper.select: SELECT ITINERARY_ID, TRIP_ID, ITINERARY_DATE, PLACE_NAME, SEQ, CONTENT_ID, LAT, LNG FROM TRIP_ITINERARY WHERE TRIP_ID = #{tripId} ORDER BY ITINERARY_DATE, SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIP_ITINERARY (ITINERARY_ID, TRIP_ID, ITINERARY_DATE, PLACE_NAME, SEQ, CONTENT_ID, LAT, LNG, CREATED_DATE) VALUES (TRIP_ITINERARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{tripId}, #{itineraryDate}, #{placeName}, #{seq}, #{contentId}, #{lat}, #{lng}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
